tool_description: Retrieve the USDA Plant Hardiness Zone for a ZIP code
title: Plant Hardiness Zone

api_list.name: Retrieve the Hardiness Zone
api_list.description: Pass a ZIP code in the endpoint path to return an object that includes the ZIP code and USDA Plant Hardiness Zone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://plant-hardiness-zone.p.rapidapi.com/zipcodes/{zipcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plant-hardiness-zone.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
